definitions.definition: An event undertaken to get money by voluntary contributions for a particular activity or cause.
examples: This year’s fundraiser will be a walkathon.

definitions.definition: A person who collects money from the public for some cause.
examples: She works as fundraiser for the Democratic Party.

main_definition: An event undertaken to get money by voluntary contributions for a particular activity or cause.
secondary_definitions: A person who collects money from the public for some cause.
